entry.title: PSA: Taproot loss of quantum protections
entry.summary: In a recent thread on the bitcoin-dev mailing list, Andrew Poelstra mentioned that exposed keys allow for ring signatures over outputs, which can enable private proof of funds via Provisions. In response to this, a member of the mailing list requested references for ring signatures over taproot and clarification on what Provisions is. The member also noted being a newcomer to the mailing list.
